nav.div: Lowndes County Schools » News » What's New » COVID-19 Information

div.img:
Due to overwhelming requests for information regarding the COVID-19, the following information has been made available to our parents, families, and stakeholders. We are in constant communication with the local and state Department of Public Health for updates concerning this issue. As always, the safety of students, staff, and families are our top priority.
COVID-19 3-6-2020.pdf
